summary: Seasoned sushi chef with extensive hospitality background, strong customer service and interpersonal skills, adept at food safety, inventory management, and high-volume kitchen operations. Proven ability to work under pressure, lead teams as a second chef, and continuously improve skills.

experience.title: Sushi Chef
experience.description: Second chef at Wasabi's Downtown; performs sushi preparation similarly to prior role at Sushi Time; oversees quality, maintains cleanliness, and supports kitchen operations; involved in inventory oversight and supplier coordination.

experience.title: Dishwasher / Line Cook
experience.description: Gained conventional kitchen and line cook experience; started in dishwashing; worked in a fast-paced environment requiring strong knife skills; left due to management changes and an opportunity to work with a prior supervisor.

experience.title: Host, Server, Dishwasher, Cook
experience.description: Progressed from dish pit to host/server; assisted customers at the sushi bar; performed prep and cooking tasks; received ServSafe managerial training; managed inventory and supplier relations; long hours with a strong work ethic and passion for sushi.

education.degree: Associate of Applied Science in Electrical-Computer Engineering
